page.title: 15 SCHOOL MEALS
page.content:
MON. Shepherds' Pie , carrots, gravy TUES. Beefburgers, chips, spaghetti WED. Roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes,cabbage THURS. Quiche Lorraine or pizza, tomatoes, chips or jacket potatoes FRI. Sausages, onions, creamed potatoes or chips SWEET: Choice from drink, yoghurt, cakes, bisciuts, trifle, ice-cream.
Typical sandwich lunch: two cheese sandwiches, Mars bar, crisps. Dinner costs 55p and is subsidised by Northants County Council. Out of 213 pupils 51 pay for dinners 65 have free meals and 67 have sandwiches. Meals are collected from a serving hatch in an infant classroom and one teacher and two dinner ladies ars on duty at each sitting.
